wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: this is what i have to say
Enabling the One Ford Business Plan

Customer

Ford Motor Company, a global automotive industry leader based in Dearborn, Michigan, manufactures or distributes automobiles across six continents. With about 166,000 employees and about 70 plants worldwide, the company's automotive brands include Ford and Lincoln. With the goal of staying on the cutting edge of the rapidly changing global automotive market, Ford has embraced One Ford, a holistic business plan focusing on uniting the Fords global team. In 2009, Fords IT team began looking into collaborative software that would help unite the company, and chose Yammer. Fords Yammer network has significantly streamlined internal communications, increasing project efficiency and helping individuals find faster resolutions to problems.

 

Solution

In the fall of 2008, Fords Head of Social Media Scott Monty saw Yammer win Best in Show at the TechCrunch50 conference in San Francisco and immediately signed up. Within a few months, about eighty members of Fords IT team had signed up and had begun collaborating. By early 2009, the network had grown to over 500 employees across multiple offices and job functions, capturing the attention of Ford IT Architect Ed Krebs. Krebs, working in Fords Advanced IT and Research group, saw enormous potential in Yammer, especially in how it directly aligned with Fords recently adopted One Ford business plan. After a thorough evaluation weighing risks, costs, and benefits, Krebs upgraded Fords network and began laying the groundwork for a company-wide rollout. With Yammer, Ford employees save time, have developed a culture of sharing, and can find answers to questions faster.

a:4:{i:0;s:156:"Employees regularly save time, like the marketer who used Yammer to complete a Taurus marketing campaign in 2 weeks that normally would have taken 4 months.";i:1;s:148:"Yammer Groups let employees bond over shared interests, leading to better teamwork in work situations and more cross-functional assistance provided.";i:2;s:76:"Employees can regularly get resolutions to IT questions within 5-10 minutes.";i:3;s:172:"Using Yammer, the IT group solved a fundamental SharePoint issue within a week due to multiple user perspectives posted, which normally would have taken upwards of a month.";}

Customer

Based in Columbus, Ohio, Nationwide has grown over the last 80 years from a small mutual auto insurer to one of the largest insurance and financial services companies in the world, with more than $135 billion in statutory assets. In 2007, the company embarked on a large-scale project toward being more collaborative, flattening hierarchies, and increasing companywide knowledge flow and access. The insurance giant felt it crucial that they maintain the scale and influence of a large company but be able to deliver a personalized experience and the feeling of a close-knit community for every policyholder to think global but act local.

 

Solution

Nationwide chose Yammer as its primary communication channel in its push toward flattened hierarchy and better management. The network grew quickly, with adoption from the full spectrum of employees, salespeople to executives. Yammer has allowed senior leaders within Nationwide to communicate with employees in a sincere and informal manner, fostering a culture of openness and transparency. The company has also reported significantly improved knowledge flow across silos and geographical regions Nationwide employees are better informed and connected than ever. Finally, the company sees innovation coming from all levels, unconstrained by corporate hierarchy.

a:3:{i:0;s:165:"Fostering a Culture of Transparency: Associates and Executives are more connected, feeling open to communication in a less formal environment than email or meetings.";i:1;s:155:"Better Innovation: The best ideas are surfaced and discussed regardless of their origin, and management can take notice of the companys brightest stars.";i:2;s:86:"Better Knowledge Flow: Knowledge isnt siloed into specific regions or departments. ";}

Customer

Celebrating its 90th year of innovation, Pitney Bowes is a $5.6 billion company that employs 33,000 worldwide and provides software, hardware and services that integrate physical and digital communications channels. Long known for making its customers more productive, Pitney Bowes is increasingly helping other companies grow their business. With the motto Every connection is a new opportunity the company understands the importance of maintaining an interconnected workforce, and the Management Center for Learning & Performance has taken note of Yammers impact on the company.

Solution

Mike Petersell, the director of Pitney Bowes Management Center for Learning and Development, identifies Yammer as a pivotal element of employee learning. The employee learning process is often most efficient and effective when it occurs in a non-formal and natural way, which Yammer facilitates perfectly. Employees at Pitney Bowes have taken to using tags and groups to categorize information, a process that contributes to the companys view of its Yammer network as a crucial tool for employee access to information. Petersell sees Yammers value in the connections it makes possible:

a:3:{i:0;s:143:"Better Employee Learning: Yammer facilitates and augments the highly valuable casual learning that happens every day within Pitney Bowes.";i:1;s:126:"Easily Searchable Knowledge Base: Each discussion is archived and accessible to all within the organization for future access.";i:2;s:85:"Better Knowledge Flow: Knowledge isnt siloed into specific regions or departments.";}

Customer

The Suncorp Group is home to more than 25 brands across Australia and New Zealand spanning banking, insurance, investment and superannuation. As one of Australia's leaders in financial services, the Suncorp Group is one of Australia's top 25 listed companies, Queensland's largest listed corporation and includes Australia's largest domestic general insurance operations and its 5th largest bank. With more than $97 billion in assets, Suncorp has over 219,000 shareholders, over 16,000 employees and around 7 million customers.

Suncorp's Social Media Experiment

Suncorp has benefited from incorporating and integrating Yammer as part of its social media mix. The tool has played a pivotal role in helping geographically dispersed people and teams to connect, share, discuss and innovate. It has also helped Suncorp create a culture where collaboration is more natural by enabling people to interact online in an open, informal and transparent way. Within a matter of months, Yammer membership ahandful of early adopters to over 1700 users and continues to grow.

a:4:{i:0;s:80:"Increased informal knowledge flow across the organisation through Microblogging.";i:1;s:160:"Overcome barriers to collaboration, providing instant connection for people, teams, informal networks, communities of practice and other shared interest groups.";i:2;s:176:"Improved alignment between executives and employees by use of announcements to communicate messages and quickly crowdsource and get ideas, suggestions and answers to questions.";i:3;s:113:"Helped stimulate greater sharing and discussion among common role groups eg. Developers, Architects, and Testers.";}

Customer

Starcom MediaVest Group (SMG) is one of the largest and most celebrated brand communications and consumer contact organizations in the world, with 110 offices in 67 countries. SMGs 6,200 global media professionals looking to build captivating connections between consumers and brands for hundreds of clients, including many of the world's most powerful marketers such as Coca-Cola, P&G, Walmart, and Kraft.

Solution

SMG Chief Digital Officer, Sean Finnegan leveraged Yammer to keep employees up to date in real-time on high-level conversations happening as part of a global portal tour with key industry partners; Google, Yahoo!, Facebook & MSN. SMGers around the world could follow the tag #portaltour in Yammer to review meeting updates and pose questions or dialogue with senior management as part of the message threads.

a:4:{i:0;s:74:"Collective employee expertise is leveraged, surfacing key emerging topics.";i:1;s:101:"Meeting highlights and action plans are easily captured via threads and shared globally in real-time.";i:2;s:75:"Employees feel engaged and empowered to be part of key management dialogue.";i:3;s:63:"In 3 days, 151 messages were shared with 1549 active followers.";}

Customer

LG Electronics believes that technological innovation is the key to success in the marketplace. Founded in 1958, LG has led the way in bringing advanced digital products and applied technologies to its customers. With its commitment to innovation and assertive global business policies, LG aims to become a worldwide leader in advanced digital technology. With 113 local operations around the globe, the company uses Yammer to streamline the flow of information and knowledge through the company, improving business performance.

Solution

In 2010, LG Electronics has seen Yammer spread virally across its global team, and the benefits have been staggering. Laurence Smith, VP of Global Learning and Development at the company, attributes these benefits to two core elements of Yammer: transparency and synchronicity. Transparency, because information and knowledge silos are broken down, allowing more people to find more information, faster. And synchronicity, because parties from around the globe are able to weigh in and communicate in real time around topics they otherwise never would. The following are examples of direct, bottom-line benefits that LG has gained through using Yammer:

Faster, Cheaper, and Better Solutions

The LG Learning and Development team set out to create a value-based training guide for new employees. Collaborating through Yammer, the team got feedback and weigh-in from numerous global subsidiaries, allowing them to craft a better fit for each region. With instant feedback from around the world, the team completed the project in 4 weeks instead of a planned 12 weeks. The Learning and Development team came up with a better, cheaper solution, leveraging regional best practices and getting buy-in during the creation process.

Truly Global Conferences and Talent Identification

On stage at LGs annual Learning Summit conference were two screens: one with the presentation content and one with LGs live Yammer feed. As LG employees from around the globe watched the conference webcast, they posted questions to Yammer, which conference speakers answered in real time. When specific engineering and product questions arose, experts chimed in from nearly every continent, identifying lynchpin employees whom most people never knew existed within minutes.

Fast and Thorough Decision Making

LG recently decided that it would make English its official working language, and a team within the communications department was charged with creating a plan to facilitate this significant shift. One member of the team came up with a highly controversial proposal, which he had crowdsourced on Yammer. When presenting the proposal to executives, the employee backed up his ideas and assumptions by showing that members of each executives department had provided feedback on the proposal within Yammer. The biggest critics of the proposal were satisfied with the group-minded decision and embraced the plan, ultimately leading to a successful shift toward English for the company. As Laurence Smith notes, Yammer builds change management into the process.

Easy Resolution to Controversial Issues

LG executives encountered a controversial issue, with parties on two sides disagreeing about a course of events. One executive decided hed be open with the company and bring up the issue on Yammer, asking for examples. He quickly got a number of responses that answered the question, resolving the issue in a fast, simple and open manner.

a:6:{i:0;s:117:"Faster and Cheaper Solution Development: Teams can crowdsource ideas, building feedback into the development process.";i:1;s:138:"Faster Decision Making: LG decision-makers can quickly access the companys organizational knowledge to make the best-informed decision.";i:2;s:157:"Truly Global Conferences: Employees across the globe can participate and ask questions in real time, fostering an environment of inclusion and participation.";i:3;s:126:"Improved Business Performance: Yammer saves LG time and money because of transparent discussions and synchronous connections. ";i:4;s:169:"Talent Identification: LGs most knowledgeable and influential employees are able to shine and share their wealth of relevant information with the rest of the company.";i:5;s:215:"Change Management is Built into the Yammer Feedback Process: When interested parties are involved in a decision-making process, they are happier with the result because their perspective has been taken into account.";}

item.title: Security
item.dc:creator: dkawamoto
item.content:encoded:
How is your data protected?

Secure Connections

All connections to Yammer are secured via SSL/TLS. Any attempt to connect over HTTP is redirected to HTTPS.

Application Security

Yammer utilizes secure development best practices that integrate security reviews throughout design, prototype and deployment.

Customer Data Protection

All data is classified as confidential and treated as such. Inbound and outbound low-level logical firewalls ensure that data cannot be leaked between Yammer networks. Sensitive production data is never migrated or used outside of the production network.

Strict Separation Between Application and Data

Yammer's web application servers are physically and logically separated from servers that store customer data.

Hardened Operating System

Yammer runs on hardened Linux servers. Externally exposed critical patches are addressed within 24 hours.

Data Center Security

Yammers offsite SAS70 Type II data center provides 24/7/365 video surveillance, biometric and pin based locks, strict personnel access controls and detailed visitor entry logs.

Internal and Third Party Testing

Yammer routinely runs internal and external vulnerability scans and penetration tests. Third party firms are utilized to perform in-depth quarterly security reviews.

Business Continuity

Your data is backed up multiple times a day and protected with strong encryption on disk. Backups are transferred offsite over SSH and properly deleted after six months.

If you would like more information on our security policy or if you would like to report a security issue, contact us at security@yammer-inc.com.

Additional Tools for Security and Control

User Provisioning

Automate user management with Yammers Directory Sync tool. Synchronize company directory systems to provision or de-provision users.

Single Sign-On (SSO)

Yammer supports SAML 1.1/2.0 based SSO on all Web, Desktop, and Mobile clients.

Password Policies

Administrative controls allow the definition of password policies for length, expiry and complexity to mirror your corporate password policies.

Strong Authentication

Yammer's strong authentication option requires encrypted browser tokens so that users can only log in from verified browsers. Log in attempts from unrecognized browsers will require users to reconfirm access to their corporate email addresses.

Logical Firewall

You can choose to restrict access to a specified IP range so that your network is only accessible at designated physical locations or through your organizations VPN.

Keyword Monitoring

Monitor your network and alert your admins when matching patterns or keywords are posted in Yammer.

View more admin tools here.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Rest assured that your company information is safe and secure at all times with Yammer. Every user, application, and system is protected by the following security controls to preserve the confidentiality of your data and the integrity of your business.

item.title: Deployment
item.dc:creator: dkawamoto
item.content:encoded:
No Hardware or Software to Install

Avoid wasting IT time and resources on complex implementation processes. Because its in the cloud, Yammer rolls out immediately with minimal set up so employees can get started right away.  

Exceptional Uptime

To ensure maximum uptime and continuous availability, Yammer provides redundant data protection and the most advanced facilities protection available, along with a complete data recovery plan. Yammer has a proven 90+ percent uptime.  

Superior Scalability

As your company scales to meet market demands, Yammer adjusts with you. Its cloud infrastructure is elastic - it can scale up to tens of thousands of users or down to a few according to company needs.  

Pain-free Automatic Upgrades

Forget about deploying periodic manual upgrades. Yammers automatic upgrades ensure that your users seamlessly transition onto the latest features without wasting IT time or resources.  

Synchronized Account Provisioning

Automatically sync user additions and deletions from your existing company directory. Yammers Directory Sync utility provisions and de-provisions users based on LDAP queries.  

Instant On-boarding

No intensive training required. Yammers user-friendly interface and intuitive design make it easy for new users to start collaborating right away.  

Roll-Out Support Services

Plan and execute your roll-out under the guidance of a dedicated Customer Engagement Team. Leverage the industry experience and product knowledge of our experts to optimize your network. Learn more here.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Yammers cloud infrastructure ensures scalability, disaster recovery, and uptime you can depend on. And because its in the cloud, you can forget about lengthy installations and inconvenient upgrades. Roll out Yammer across your entire organization in a matter of minutes and start seeing returns on your investment from day one.

item.title: Voluntary Adoption
item.dc:creator: dkawamoto
item.content:encoded:
Organic Network Growth

Much like consumer social networks, your Yammer network naturally develops through peer-to-peer engagement. Users invite each other to collaborate on content, join groups, share files, and more, driving organic adoption from the bottom up.  

Instant On-Boarding

No intensive training or complex customizations required. Yammers user-friendly interface and intuitive design make it easy for new users to start collaborating right away.  

Exceptionally Engaged Users

Inspire passion and productivity in the office with Yammers fun and engaging interface. All over the world employees are sharing their love for Yammer in creative ways - even flash mobs!  

Superior Product Development

Yammer is built and improved faster than virtually any other enterprise software application. This ensures consistent employee engagement even as needs evolve over time. Learn more here.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Voluntary Adoption is the New ROI
In order for social initiatives to succeed at your company, it's critical to choose tools that employees actually want to use. Yammer was built to drive voluntary adoption that ensures maximum ROI.

item.title: Product Development
item.dc:creator: dkawamoto
item.content:encoded:
1. Build

Similar to consumer software companies, Yammer takes an iterative approach to development, delivering incremental product enhancements to users each week. While most enterprise software companies spend months or years building disruptive and overly complex features that often fail to gain adoption, Yammers approach ensures that resources are always dedicated to building and improving the features that matter most to your users.

2. Measure

Once a feature is released, we then carefully measure how effectively it drives employee engagement and other desired user behaviors. Because most users are difficult to predict, change over time, and arent accurately represented by a vocal minority of power users, we prefer not to make any assumptions. Instead, Yammer engineers collect feedback in a couple of ways:

Behavioral Analytics

We measure user behavior with quantifiable metrics like rates of engagement and retention. We then analyze a features impact on these metrics to gauge its success.

User Research

We combine quantitative analytics with extensive qualitative research. We talk to users directly, perform usability testing, and ask why? to fully understand the true value a feature adds.

3. Improve

Based on our behavioral analytics and qualitative user feedback, we determine the best next incremental improvements to achieve maximum usability over time. Its not just reactive, either - because Yammer works with companies of all sizes, across all industries, were able to see emerging patterns and common problems that arent immediately obvious within any one organization. This unique viewpoint helps us anticipate needs and allows us to keep up with your organization as it changes.

4. Repeat

This accelerated cycle repeats over and over again. Feedback from one iteration informs the next, resulting in a finely-tuned product that will continue to adapt to meet users needs as they evolve.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Tired of dealing with outdated enterprise software? You wont have to wait months or years for Yammer to address issues or add functionality. Yammer develops features iteratively based on the actual behaviors of your employees and goals of your organization. Frequent, subtle product enhancements allow Yammer to adapt along with your users and continue to provide more and more value over time.

item.title: Support Services
item.dc:creator: dkawamoto
item.content:encoded:
Customer Success Manager (CSM)

Drawing on industry experience, a dedicated CSM will advise you on:

Strategy

Your CSM will work with your leadership team to align business strategies, develop network architecture, and identify use cases specific to your organization.

Community Management & Curation

Your CSM helps curate content, facilitate group creation and analysis, and direct end user support to drive productivity.

Analytics

Receive weekly analytics and customer reports from your CSM, who will translate usage metrics and trends into actionable strategies to add value.

Solutions Engineer (SE)

Easily integrate Yammer with all the enterprise tools your company already uses under the guidance of a technically certified SE.

Company Directory Integrations

Your SE can synchronize Yammer with your company directory to streamline provisioning and de-provisioning of Yammer accounts.

Intranet/Portal Integrations

Work with your SE to integrate Yammer with your company intranet, SharePoint, and other portals, making them more social, mobile, and engaging.

Activity Streams Integrations

Your SE will configure activity stream integrations with Salesforce.com, Netsuite, and other applications, turning Yammer into a central hub for all business collaboration.

Superior User Education Services

Comprehensive training services customized for your organization provide employees with best practices and company-specific use cases that help boost engagement.

Network Optimization Resources

Access targeted admin implementation guides and end user materials that increase engagement from the Yammer Success Center.

Premium Customer Support

Yammers knowledgeable customer support team is here for you 24/7. Contact us for answers to all of your product-related questions.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Optimize your network with the ongoing support of Yammers Customer Engagement Team. Leverage their industry expertise, product knowledge, and social best practices to maximize your investment and ensure the success of your network.

a:1:{i:0;s:188:"Employees from one continent ask a question and employees from another continent respond with crucial real time information and suggestions. Our client service has improved through Yammer.";}

a:2:{i:0;s:219:"Yammer has gone beyond all of our expectations and has become embedded in the way that we're doing things. It's helped drive innovation and build community at Deloitte, and we're finding new value in the tool every day.";i:1;s:262:"We are continually amazed by the creativity and ingenuity of our employees, who create new use cases on Yammer every day. Enterprise social networking has helped transform how we operate and collaborate, yet, I feel like we are still just scratching the surface.";}

item.title: Yammer Platform
item.dc:creator: sgoertler
item.content:encoded:
Open Graph for the Enterprise

Finally, theres a simple, secure way to share content across your entire IT ecosystem. Open Graph, the integration standard pioneered by consumer companies like Facebook, is now available for enterprise applications. Yammer engineers and third-party developers alike use this trusted protocol to build seamless connections between all your business applications, adding value to your existing investments.  

Featured Integrations

A growing number of developers are using the Open Graph protocol and Yammers open APIs to build powerful integrations that extend the social experience to third party applications. Featured integrations include:  

SharePoint

Drive SharePoint adoption and engagement by integrating Yammer feeds, notifications, search results, and profile data. Increase visibility of SharePoint activity by surfacing it in a real-time Activity Streams Ticker on the Yammer homepage.  

Freeborders Connector for SAP

Bring important SAP activity to light in Yammer so employees across the company can respond and collaborate in real-time. This robust integration sends updates on SAP followed objects to Yammer, where users can discover and discuss it.  

Salesforce.com

Extend a social layer beyond your sales department. Track the progress of Salesforce.com accounts, opportunities, leads, and campaigns within Yammer, where coworkers from all departments can easily collaborate in real-time.   See the full list of integration partners here.  

Yammer Connect Social Plug-ins

Dont see the integration youre looking for? With Yammer Connect, you can easily add a social layer to virtually any enterprise application in minutes.  

Yammer Embed

Bring real-time Yammer conversations into third-party apps to drive engagement. Yammer Embed lets users send and receive messages from a feed you can nest in any web-based system.  

Login Button

Simplify registration and sign-in for any third-party app. The Login Button leverages profile data from Yammer to authenticate users and streamline registration.  

Like Button

Seamlessly share data from other business apps in Yammer. The Like Button lets employees send their favorite external content to Yammer, where coworkers can discover and discuss it.  

Open APIs

Build customized social functionality into any application. Use Yammers open APIs to develop your own integrations to connect feeds, activity stories, profile data and more.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Maximize the Power of Enterprise Apps

Get the most out of your entire IT ecosystem by integrating with the Yammer Platform. Our open APIs give you the power to connect all your enterprise applications with a single social layer that increases app visibility and drives engagement for maximum results.

a:1:{i:0;s:277:"Yammer's iPhone app is a great resource for all employees, especially given that many don't work in front of a computer all day. The membership directory on the app makes it easy to quickly find accurate contact information for any Saint Francis Yammer members while on the go.";}
a:1:{i:0;s:51:"Internal Communications Manager, Saint Francis Care";}

Yammer is the leading provider of enterprise social networks, helping over 200,000 organizations transform the way they work. Our award-winning Software-as-a-Service empowers employees to collaborate across departments, geographies, content and business applications. Companies and organizations from across the globe, including more than 85 percent of the Fortune 500, are using Yammer to improve employee productivity and engagement.

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: pwpadmin
item.content:encoded:
Sales Information

To discuss pricing, security, and to request additional materials, pleasecall 888-926-7377 or 415-796-7400 or Contact Sales  

Yammer Support

Help Desk  

Feedback & Feature Requests

Help us decide what we work on next bysuggesting ideas and voting on them.  

Legal & Privacy Information

Review our policies, or contact us atlegal@yammer-inc.com.  

Press Inquiries

Contact us atpr@yammer-inc.com.  

Reporting a Potential Security Vulnerability

Please share full details of the suspected security vulnerability by sending an email tosecurity@yammer-inc.com. Please include as much information as possible so the Yammer security team may verify the issue.

item.title: Affiliates
item.dc:creator: afang
item.content:encoded:
Get Started

Gain exclusive access to the tools that let you successfully add social to existing business systems. Our training and certification resources help you expand your social integration expertise to customers. Partner with Yammer to increase awareness of your value added services and become the go-to expert for your customers enterprise social integrations.

Co-Marketing

Become an advocate for enterprise social and demonstrate your expertise through special co-marketing opportunities.

Referral

Become a trusted advisor on enterprise social by working with our teams to implement partner integrations.

Benefits Co-Marketing Program Referral Program
Technical training and certification
Partner-only marketing resources and collateral
Customer Success Manager (CSM) support
30-day Premium promotion available
API integration support resources
Participate in case studies, videos, blog posts and event references
Dedicated technical partner support
End-user support channels
Network usage data and reports
Referral fees

Affiliate Partner Program Resources

Download Program Brochure Download Getting Started Guide

Join a Growing Ecosystem

Our growing global ecosystem of partners is driving the next wave of enterprise social networking. Become a member of our External Affiliate Network to collaborate with other best-in-class partners to ensure the success of your social integration strategy.

Questions? Concerns? Need help with your integrations? Contact Us.

[gravityform id="2" name="Get Started"] ×

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Grow your Business and Empower Customers with Social.

a:9:{i:0;s:14:"For Executives";i:1;s:9:"For Sales";i:2;s:6:"For IT";i:3;s:6:"For HR";i:4;s:18:"For Communications";i:5;s:13:"For Marketing";i:6;s:20:"For Customer Service";i:7;s:7:"For R&D";i:8;s:25:"For Professional Services";}

Millions of people are using social networks to connect with friends and family. Now, Yammer has brought social networking to the enterprise, helping more than four million people communicate, collaborate and get work done faster. Connect your company, align teams and empower employees to build a better business.

Good enterprise software helps you optimize business performance, but only if your employees are actually using it. Yammer applies consumer design principles to build software that is easy to use yet robust in enterprise functionality - driving voluntary adoption and employee engagement. Yammer is proven to save time, reduce work cycles and boost productivity. Thats why youll see results like this:

a:7:{i:0;s:33:"Connect People Across the Company";i:1;s:26:"Break into Team Workspaces";i:2;s:24:"Create and Share Content";i:3;s:39:"Collaborate with Customers and Partners";i:4;s:35:"Get Mobile Access Anytime, Anywhere";i:5;s:34:"Integrate with other Business Apps";i:6;s:50:"Administer Securely with Enterprise-Grade IT Tools";}
A Social Network for Your Company
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Yammer brings the power of social networking to the enterprise in a private and secure environment. Yammer is as easy to use as great consumer software like Facebook and Twitter, but designed for collaboration across your company. Connect people, teams, content and even business applications with productivity software that employees love to use.
What Can You Do With Yammer

a:7:{i:0;s:167:"Stay connected to the people, information and tools you need to get work done. Instantly share ideas, discuss projects, search for documents, ask questions, and more. ";i:1;s:158:"Unlock the power of your team by creating dedicated team workspaces for any project, department or topic. Facilitate open, instant collaboration in real time.";i:2;s:146:"Brainstorm ideas, draft documents together, share large files and make content discoverable across the company without a single email or meeting. ";i:3;s:115:"Create an external network in 20 seconds to collaborate efficiently with business contacts outside of your company.";i:4;s:111:"Stay connected to coworkers no matter where you are from an iPhone, iPad, Android, Windows Phone or Blackberry.";i:5;s:167:"Integrate Yammer with SharePoint, SAP, Salesforce and other business applications to eliminate information silos and enable seamless collaboration across your company.";i:6;s:130:"As a Yammer Network Administrator, easily control, monitor and administer your secure Yammer network according to company policy. ";}
Over 200,000 companies are changing the way they work with Yammer. Dont just take our word for it. Hear it directly from Yammer customers.

a:6:{i:0;s:18:"Voluntary Adoption";i:1;s:25:"Enterprise Grade Security";i:2;s:20:"Pain-Free Deployment";i:3;s:28:"Superior Product Development";i:4;s:19:"The Yammer Platform";i:5;s:16:"Support Services";}

a:6:{i:0;s:188:"Social software can transform company communication and efficiency, but only if employees choose to use it. Give them tools uniquely engineered to drive voluntary adoption for maximum ROI.";i:1;s:210:"Yammers highest priority is to preserve the confidentiality and integrity of company information. Protect your data at all times with Yammers rigorous security policies that exceed the industry standard. ";i:2;s:195:"Forget about lengthy installations and inconvenient upgrades. Roll out Yammer across your entire organization in a matter of minutes and keep functionality up to date with seamless auto-upgrades.";i:3;s:195:"Choose tools that adapt to meet your users needs. Similar to consumer software features, Yammer product enhancements are developed iteratively based on user behavior to ensure value over time.";i:4;s:207:"Maximize the power of all your enterprise applications by connecting them with a single social layer. Yammers open APIs make it easy to integrate with SAP, SharePoint, and other existing business systems.";i:5;s:172:"Leverage the industry expertise and product knowledge of a dedicated Customer Engagement Team to optimize your network and maximize your investments in enterprise software.";}
Powerful, Secure, Built for the Enterprise.

Drive efficiency and enable collaboration across your company through the power of a private and secure social network. You can easily deploy, manage, maintain, and integrate Yammer with the rest of your IT ecosystem. And because Yammer is built like consumer applications, its superior usability drives voluntarily adoption and ensures immediate returns on your investment.

item.title: Developers
item.dc:creator: afang
item.content:encoded:
Easily build or customize applications and integrate social with any resource on the web, intranet or enterprise application using our developer toolkit and Open APIs. Yammer Developers use these tools to create deeply social experiences for business users to make companies more connected, open, and productive.

Get Started Clicking Get Started constitutes acceptance of our API Terms of Service.

Integrate Social and Customize Applications

Customize your enterprise applications with our Open APIs, and use our REST APIs to create unique applications utilizing Yammer data. Gain early access to new APIs so you can develop and deliver to market faster.

Increase Awareness
and Drive Adoption

Easily add a social layer to business applications with Yammer Connect and Yammer Embed. Reach a larger network of users to drive awareness and adoption of your enterprise apps with Activity Stream Ticker.

Training, Support and Marketing Resources

Access online training courses, partner certification opportunities, as well as API integration support resources. Be featured in Yammer newsletters, email campaigns, guest blogs and events to promote your applications.

Join the Growing Partner Developer Network

Join Yammers External Developer Network to drive awareness of your applications and collaborate with other leading SaaS providers building the next wave of enterprise applications.

Questions? Concerns? Need help with your integrations? Contact Us.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Integrate Social. Build Awareness. Customize Applications.
We're on a mission to help companies build an empowered workforce, where employees are happy and engaged in the work they do.

item.title: Partners
item.dc:creator: ado
item.content:encoded:
Harness the power of enterprise social networking to get more out of your existing business applications and help grow your client relationships. Become a Yammer Partner today and discover the benefits of social.

  • Developers

    Increase collaboration and productivity for business users everywhere through the Yammer Developer Program, which provides the tools for you to get more from existing business applications and create your own enterprise apps.

    Learn More

  • Affiliates

    The Yammer Affiliate Program enables technology advocates, consultants and systems integrators to engage with Yammer to help customers optimize collaboration, streamline deployments, and increase usage of existing systems.

    Learn More

Questions? Concerns? Need help with your integrations? Contact Us.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: eoh
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
